title: Water conservation
creator_credit: David Cobham, Guild House Films, David Cobham Productions, Film Producers Guild and Simon Campbell-Jones
brief_description: Explains the advantages to the farmer of having his own water conservation scheme. Shows how a small reservoir can be constructed to make water available for irrigation purposes during the summer. Hints are given on siting, selection of water source and use of plastic or waterproof linings.
